Articles.Content:
can you maybe give us some updates about actual game mechanics, instead of just showing some engines or planets you made? like even though they are nice to have, assets like these are kinda irrelevant if the game mechanics are bad, please show us some new gameplay stuff!

 

EDIT: like bruh, this is how you do a monthly update on unfinished game
https://sbox.facepunch.com/news/sept2021

like no offense but your updates are just not sparking any interest, you could tell us some about multiplayer or whatever cool features you are currently making

Edited October 25, 2021 by Fullmetal Analyst

Unless some big deal in PD says stop, no more, and there are no updates whatsoever. Being an indie dev and being a dev working on triple A title with huge budget is different and we should be glad that we're getting anything. Sure it would be nice but we still can't even preorder the game (I don't see a reason to BTW) so complex explanations could appear a day before release and nothing would change.

2022 is coming fast, pretty sure there's going to be a huge marketing campaign with trailers, gameplays, interviews, whatever you dream of. Just like it was back in 2019.

we cant preorder s&box either, they are just involving the community in a proper way which includes giving some people access to a full dev preview, basically they are just letting people play with what they made so far, imo this is how you make a good, long lasting product, and for this relatively small effort, they are getting alot in return from the community.

Edited October 25, 2021 by Fullmetal Analyst
